loglevel.help: 0:none, 1:error, 2:warning, 3:debug, 4:trace. Higher levels include all lower levels

contentlanguage.help: en for English, es for Spanish, etc.

searchqueryargname.help: search provider's query string argument for search keywords

trustedoriginsstringlist.help: each child element of this element may contain in its inner text an origin you trust not to serve malicious content.

textbodypadding.help: number of character cells of empty space between console vertical edges and web content
